item.title: Tree stopping street light from lighting the street., 22nd August
item.description:
The tree is completely grown over and therefore blocking all light from the street light. Streetlight is completely covered by tree branches and leaves. Dangerous. A friend was leaving my house late one night and also commented on the lack of light on the street outside my house.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Athelstan Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On Windermere Avenue outside Chester Court, 22nd August
item.description:

item.title: Litter litter everywhere, 22nd August
item.description:
Central Reservation and verges on north circular from Cambridge roundabout to Wilmer way covered with lot and lots of litter and rubbish. This part of north London is beginning to look like it a third world country with the disgraceful amount of rubbish left in the verges
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 345, North Circular Road, Bowes, London
